# simulate data

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
require(simcompl)
require(dplyr)
require(rstan)
N <- 100
simdat <- create_sample(obs = N, rate = .25, g1 = c(.5, .5, 0))
```

```{r}
niter <- 400
struct_fit <- stan("stan_application.stan", data=list(N = nrow(simdat), 
                                                      y = simdat$y, 
                                                      x1 = simdat$x1,
                                                      x2 = simdat$x2,
                                                      z = simdat$z), 
                   iter = niter, refresh = niter/3, cores = 4)
```
